# Changes in 2.13.11

- Update eu4 ironman melter to 1.37
- Improve mod handling when buggy duplicated mod entries were contained in a save
- Fix game icons being broken in eu4 and hoi4
- Fix integer overflow for some stellaris campaigns
- Add portuguese brazil translations (Thanks to @EnzoMaitan)
- Add spanish translations (Thanks to @L3KTRO)
